text: It can be difficult to see the optimal path
that gets you all the way to your cloud goals
because oftentimes, you need to consider every stage
of the cloud optimization process, making it hard
to prioritize opportunities, create action plans,
and monitor system health.
(computer warbling)
AWS Trusted Advisor empowers you to focus on the pillars
that matter most to you, whether it's

cost optimization,
(cash register dinging)
security, or improving resilience.
It simplifies

identifying and implementing
(computer warbling)
actions to optimize costs and performance,
enhance security, and operate efficiency at scale,
all while driving proactive initiatives
to achieve your organization's business goals.
By comparing your environment to AWS best practices,
Trusted Advisor offers recommendations
that focus on the most important tasks with context-driven
and prioritized recommendations, guided next steps,
and automated engagements.
These tailored recommendations tell you what action to take,
the insights that inform the decision,

and the value returned
(coins jingle)
versus the effort required.
(clock ticking)
And because it uses a near-realtime view
of your organization's performance against best practices
and benchmarks, you can make quicker decisions

and gain the most
(mouse clicking)
out of your cloud investment.
Take control of your cloud optimization process
with AWS Trusted Advisor.
(upbeat music)
